reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 560/99: DESIGNATION UNDER SECTION 25 OF THE ACT
reg_info.reg_name_text: DESIGNATION UNDER SECTION 25 OF THE ACT
reg_info.act_under: Fairness is a Two-Way Street Act (Construction Labour Mobility), 1999

content.content: 1. Quebec is a designated jurisdiction for the purposes of all of the provisions of the Act other than Part I (Construction Contractors), Part II (Construction Workers), Part III (Transportation of Aggregates), Part IV (Retail Sales Tax Enforcement) and subsection 24 (2). O. Reg. 560/99, s. 1. Français
content.raw_html:
1. Quebec is a designated jurisdiction for the purposes of all of the provisions of the Act other than Part I (Construction Contractors), Part II (Construction Workers), Part III (Transportation of Aggregates), Part IV (Retail Sales Tax Enforcement) and subsection 24 (2). O. Reg. 560/99, s. 1.

Français
